Create animated version with multiple scenarios

Source: R/rv_airplane.R
rv_create_airplane_animation.Rd

Create animated version with multiple scenarios

rv_create_airplane_animation(
  risk_ratio = c(`Scenario A` = 0.01, `Scenario B` = 0.1, `Scenario C` = 0.3, `Scenario
    D` = 0.7),
  transition_length = 0.5,
  state_length = 1,
  risk_places = NULL,
  risk_vector = NULL,
  risk_name = "Risk",
  fill = c("coral1", "darkgoldenrod1", "darkseagreen1", "lightskyblue1"),
  na_colour = "grey80",
  rows = 33,
  seats_per_row = 6,
  title = NULL,
  font_family = "sans",
  font_family_seats = "mono",
  legend_position = "none",
  ncol = NULL,
  nrow = NULL,
  guides = NULL
)

Arguments

risk_ratio
transition_length
state_length
risk_places
risk_vector
risk_name
fill
na_colour
rows
title
font_family
font_family_seats
legend_position
ncol
nrow
guides

Value
